name: A Bird's Tale
description:
A Bird's Tale

Help keep a happy home in this short hand-crafted platformer telling a touching tale about a bird, it's children and their home.

 

CONTROLS
  • A / D or Arrow keys: Move
  • Space, W or Up arrow to Jump and hold to glide

Developed for the Free Palestine Jam.

Made with Godot 3.3.2, Adobe Illustrator, Audacity & Ableton Live

Additional Assets:
Palette based on Rabbit by GrafxKid
Audio: Sidearm Studios, Kenney Vleugels
Shader: r3tr0_dev
Paint Texture: Josep Martins
